short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified when Second Life friends go online/offline. View online friends, access profiles, and customize silent notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension makes it easy to stay connected with your Second Life friends without needing to log in to the virtual world. It keeps you informed by sending instant notifications whenever your friends come online or go offline, so you always know who’s available at a glance.

With a dedicated panel, you can view which of your friends are currently online directly from the extension, saving you the time and effort of launching Second Life just to check. Additionally, you can access their profiles right from the extension for quick reference.

The extension includes customizable settings, allowing you to manage notifications to suit your needs. Silent notifications ensure you can stay updated without interruptions, and other options let you personalize how alerts are displayed.

Stay in the loop with your Second Life friends effortlessly, even when you’re not logged in, with this convenient and user-friendly extension!


This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected to Second Life® or Linden Lab®. Second Life® and Linden Lab® are trademarks of Linden Research, Inc.
